DDescription.description: Get a collection of ProcessStatisticsBO objects. Type is reqired, that means one can only retrieve ProcessStatisticsBOs of a single type at a time. The returned collection is sorted by start date, newest first.
The type of the process. Used to group processes of the same type when evaluating statistics. Usually something like: "Import", "Replication".
If present then only ProcessStatisticsBOs with a start date >= OldestStartDate are returned.
Sorted by start date, newest first.
